channel.title: Update Failiure
channel.description:
Hello,
Not for the first time when I update the workstation freezes and I'm forced to reset. Usually a dpkg audit and configure fix any issues. However this time they don't. Here's the log:
dpkg: error processing package linux-headers-3.16.0-4-common (--configure): package is in a very bad inconsistent state; you should reinstall it before attempting configuration dpkg: dependency problems prevent configuration of linux-headers-3.16.0-4-586: linux-headers-3.16.0-4-586 depends on linux-headers-3.16.0-4-common (= 3.16.7-ckt20-1+deb8u4); however: Package linux-headers-3.16.0-4-common is not configured yet.
dpkg: error processing package linux-headers-3.16.0-4-586 (--configure): dependency problems - leaving unconfigured dpkg: dependency problems prevent configuration of linux-headers-3.16.0-4-686-pae: linux-headers-3.16.0-4-686-pae depends on linux-headers-3.16.0-4-common (= 3.16.7-ckt20-1+deb8u4); however: Package linux-headers-3.16.0-4-common is not configured yet.
dpkg: error processing package linux-headers-3.16.0-4-686-pae (--configure): dependency problems - leaving unconfigured Errors were encountered while processing: linux-headers-3.16.0-4-common linux-headers-3.16.0-4-586 linux-headers-3.16.0-4-686-pae E: Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code (1)
Any ideas?

item.title: Update Failiure
item.dc:creator: glowdark
item.description:
Ok, thanks!
However is there anyway to fix the current issue?

Read full topic

item.title: Update Failiure
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
The freeze bug… Using KVM? -> See KVM forum for that discussion.
Using terminal-only? -> More RAM. (196)

Read full topic

item.title: Update Failiure
item.dc:creator: glowdark
item.description:
Hello,

Not for the first time when I update the workstation freezes and I’m forced to reset. Usually a dpkg audit and configure fix any issues.
However this time they don’t. Here’s the log:

dpkg: error processing package linux-headers-3.16.0-4-common (–configure):
package is in a very bad inconsistent state; you should
reinstall it before attempting configuration
dpkg: dependency problems prevent configuration of linux-headers-3.16.0-4-586:
linux-headers-3.16.0-4-586 depends on linux-headers-3.16.0-4-common (= 3.16.7-ckt20-1+deb8u4); however:
Package linux-headers-3.16.0-4-common is not configured yet.

dpkg: error processing package linux-headers-3.16.0-4-586 (–configure):
dependency problems - leaving unconfigured
dpkg: dependency problems prevent configuration of linux-headers-3.16.0-4-686-pae:
linux-headers-3.16.0-4-686-pae depends on linux-headers-3.16.0-4-common (= 3.16.7-ckt20-1+deb8u4); however:
Package linux-headers-3.16.0-4-common is not configured yet.

dpkg: error processing package linux-headers-3.16.0-4-686-pae (–configure):
dependency problems - leaving unconfigured
Errors were encountered while processing:
linux-headers-3.16.0-4-common
linux-headers-3.16.0-4-586
linux-headers-3.16.0-4-686-pae
E: Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code (1)

Any ideas?

Read full topic
